message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

This paper is primarily focused on computer vision tasks, specifically action recognition and optical flow estimation. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel multitask learning model using convolutional neural networks, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper discusses the importance of motion information in action recognition, which could be relevant to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and multimedia (cs.MM) research. Finally, the paper uses neural networks to improve recognition accuracy, which could also fall under the category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
